paramDescriptions.label: Shape
paramDescriptions.description: Bounding shape to use for tests.

paramDescriptions.label: Box Size [x,y,z]
paramDescriptions.description: Local-space size for box volume, centered on object origin.

paramDescriptions.label: Phase
paramDescriptions.description: Game loop phase to evaluate the volume.

paramDescriptions.label: Interval (s)
paramDescriptions.description: Evaluate no more often than every N seconds (0 = each frame).

paramDescriptions.label: Target Mode
paramDescriptions.description: How to collect candidates to test.

paramDescriptions.label: Scene Property Name
paramDescriptions.description: When mode=property, use this scene property to resolve objects.

paramDescriptions.label: Target Names []
paramDescriptions.description: JSON array of exact object names when mode=names.

paramDescriptions.label: Only Meshes
paramDescriptions.description: When mode=scene, include only mesh nodes.

paramDescriptions.label: Filter: Has Component
paramDescriptions.description: Require a component on the object (string or JSON array).

paramDescriptions.label: Filter: userData Match
paramDescriptions.description: Key/value pairs to match against object.userData.

paramDescriptions.label: Event: On Enter
paramDescriptions.description: Event name when an object enters the volume.

paramDescriptions.label: Event: On Exit
paramDescriptions.description: Event name when an object exits the volume.

paramDescriptions.label: Event: On Stay
paramDescriptions.description: Event name fired each evaluation while an object remains inside.

paramDescriptions.label: Include Object Ref
paramDescriptions.description: Include raw object in event payload.
